Contents_key1: This is the very first English course that you will be taking. It will be introducing you to some basic vocabulary and grammar concepts.
Contents_key9: Is course ko use karne ke liye instructions neeche diye gae hain:
Contents_key10: Vocabulary : In sabhi 100 words ke meaning ko samajhna hai. Mentors can quickly check if the mentee knows some of these words.
Contents_key11: Introduction of Self : Watch the video(s) and complete the assignment. By the end of this, one should be able to introduce themselves with some confidence.
Contents_key12: Nouns : Videos ya text se seekhein, exercises complete karein. Mentors to judge understanding of concept.
Contents_key14: Reading_Practice : Read the stories and solve the exercise. Mentors to see if mentees need to do this. If not, mark complete.
Contents_key15: CommonMistakesWhile_Speaking : This video is optional to watch. There are no assignments or exercises related to this.
Contents_key16: ThereorTheir : This video is optional to watch. There are no assignments or exercises related to this.
